roleset.name: to make a return attack
roleset.note: COUNTERATTACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'counterattack' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from counterattack.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: As a result of this trend , [longtime powerhouses H-P , IBM and Digital Equipment Corp.]-1 are scrambling [*-1]to counterattack with microprocessor-based systems of their own .
example.arg: with microprocessor-based systems of their own
